name: Denise Beins
what_you_do: Provides gardening education through online courses, blog content, and a membership community to help people grow their own vegetables.
who_you_serve: Home gardeners looking to grow their own vegetables, from beginners to experienced growers.
signature_programs: Harvest Club (online garden membership program), Container Growing Medium eGuide
business_focus: Online gardening education platform offering courses, membership community, and free resources to help people grow their own vegetables.
service_provided: Online gardening courses, Harvest Club membership program, blog content, eGuides, virtual Garden Jam sessions, personal garden email support
